overview: Imprisoned in a detention center, the NID, Jessy Dog and Dylan are confronted with manipulative guys. Unable to denounce them, they have to roll with the punches and put up with sexual advances. Whether they are straight or not, they have to deal with the testosterone of the other inmates. No need to look for help from the corrections officers. They have other fish to fry and other asses to bang. Submission in the communal showers, abuses in the laundry room or even back stabbing in the cells: Take a peek inside the correctional environment of the NID.
title: Incarcération
